short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixing the tables in electronical record book (el. index).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For all VUT IS users. I didn't like the way the tables in the record book looked, so I took matters to my own hands and created this extension to edit those ugly and confusing tables.

I hope you will find this extension useful and you will decide to use it. If you like it, spread the word!

There may be bugs, if you find one, contact me on Discord - @__gunter__
